TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebControlToolboxItem extends System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem

summary.span: Provides a base class for a Web server control .

span.span: Provides a base class for a Web server control .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 Web 服务器控件的工具箱项提供基类。 provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls. 此类扩展并提供以下的其他方法：This class extends and provides the following additional methods: - 获取工具箱项的属性的值。 gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item. - 获取表示控件的初始状态的 HTML。 gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control. - 获取关联的运行时组件的类型。 gets the type of the associated runtime component.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
